My name's Christian. I'm a software developer from Halifax, Nova Scotia. I created Syllable, an iPhone speed reading app, and Hangman, a hangman website.

MY WORK

I take great pride in creating beautiful, easy to use interfaces for things that people will really enjoy using. To see what I'm currently working on, check out my dribbble.

Syllable

Syllable is an iPhone app to help users learn to speed read, and in the process finish the articles they've been meaning to read.


Ranked in top 10 of the Productivity section of the App Store. Featured on sites such as LifeHacker, Beautiful Pixels, iDownloadBlog, 148apps, etc.

Hanging Around

Hangtastic is an online Hangman style game where users guess letters in the hopes of completing the full word. Hundreds of games have been recorded.


Written in mostly PHP with JavaScript for interface interactivity. Includes log in system and high scores for friends to compete against one another.
